TextView.android:text: The requisite(s) of the On-the-Job Training/Practicum is defined in the course description of each program curriculum.\n The required number of training hours specified in the course description may be extended by the company whenever necessary, subject to mutual agreement between the student, school and the company.

Only students who are enrolled in the On-the-Job Training/Practicum subject are covered by this policy. The subject On-the-Job Training/Practicum shall be taken \n
1. on the regular year level/semester as prescribed in the program curriculum \n 2. during summer prior to the terminal year provided no other academic subjects is enrolled.

Students with overload academic subjects will not be allowed to undergo on-the-job training/practicum even if he/she is a candidate for graduation The faculty member assigned to handle the On-the-Job Training/Practicum subject acts as the On-the-Job Training/Practicum Coordinator. \n He/she shall work closely with the school's Industry Linkage Coordinator and the Company's Training Supervisor. He/she shall monitor the OJT activities in conformity with the course objectives.
